title: A suggestion for teemo
body:
We all hate teemo as a champion, but it is true that it is extremely annoying to play against him and his instant blind, and a concept came to my mind just now so I thought I might share it

Q- lethal dose
Throws a dart with deadly venom at a target enemy, which will activate after two auto attacks are dealt to the enemy in 5 seconds.
If venom is activated, enemy will be temporarily be blinded for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2.0 seconds and %8/%10/%12/%14/%16 (0.03 AP) of
The enemy's health over four seconds in magic damage. (Possibly a flat amount too, but I'm not too sure on the amount)

E- Passive = deal 10/15/20/25/30 magic damage on hit (0.05 AP)
Active - grants 20/25/30/35/40% attack speed and 20/25/30/35/40 magic damage over time per auto attack for 4 seconds (magic damage is dealt over this period, and has a scaling too, but I'm not too sure on it)

You can hate on me all you want, but I find the current teemo way too monotone to play
